name: Divine Blessing
special_ability: Restores 20 health to a chosen character.
description: A celestial boon that heals the wounded.

name: Third Eye Awakening
description: A glimpse into the future, revealing enemy plans.

name: Curse of the Sage
special_ability: Reduces an enemy's attack by 50% for two turns.
description: A powerful curse that weakens foes drastically.

name: Vajra Shield
description: Summon Indra's divine shield to block any attack.

name: Time Manipulation
special_ability: Take an extra turn after this one.
description: Bend time to gain an extra move.

name: Rakshasa's Fury
special_ability: Doubles attack power for one turn.
description: Channel the wrath of a demon to unleash destruction.

name: Sudarshan Shield
special_ability: Reduces all incoming damage by 50% for two turns.
description: Summon Sudarshan Chakra to defend against enemies.

name: Chakra Purification
special_ability: Removes all debuffs from a character.
description: A cleansing ritual that restores balance.

name: Yogic Trance
description: Tap into deep meditation to regain inner strength.

name: Rudra's Wrath
special_ability: Instantly destroys an enemy character below 50% HP.
description: Unleash Rudra’s divine rage to eliminate a weak foe.

name: Vajra Strike
effect: Deals massive lightning damage to an enemy character.
description: A thunderous strike imbued with the power of Lord Indra.

name: Trishul Wrath
effect: Destroys an enemy weapon card instantly.
description: A divine attack channeling the destructive force of Lord Shiva.

name: Sanjeevani Elixir
effect: Revives a fallen character with half health.
description: A divine herb that brings warriors back from the brink of death.

name: Chakra Protection
effect: Negates the next enemy attack.
description: A protective shield formed by divine energy.

name: Ashta Siddhi
effect: Gives +3 attack and +3 defense to all your characters for 3 turns.
description: The eight divine abilities granted by Lord Hanuman.

name: Kaal Bhairav's Curse
effect: Locks an enemy character's special ability for 3 turns.
description: A terrifying curse that weakens the mightiest warriors.

name: Rakshasa Illusion
effect: Forces an opponent to skip their next turn.
description: A powerful illusion used by demons to confuse their foes.

name: Moksha Gateway
effect: Removes all negative effects from your characters.
description: A gateway to spiritual liberation that purifies the soul.

name: Pashupatastra Seal
effect: Destroys an enemy's strongest character instantly.
description: The deadliest divine weapon of Lord Shiva, capable of annihilation.

name: Surya's Blessing
effect: Restores 10 health points to all friendly characters.
description: A divine blessing from the Sun God that revitalizes warriors.

name: Narayan Shield
effect: Blocks all attacks for one turn.
description: A divine shield granted by Lord Vishnu, impenetrable to mortal weapons.

name: Mahakal’s Fury
effect: Doubles the attack power of a chosen character for two turns.
description: A devastating surge of divine rage unleashed upon enemies.

name: Karna’s Golden Armor
effect: Reduces incoming damage by 50% for three turns.
description: A celestial armor gifted by the Sun God, making the wearer nearly invincible.

name: Nagmani's Charm
effect: Removes all negative status effects from a character.
description: The mystical gem of serpents, purifying its possessor of any evil affliction.

name: Vayu's Blessing
effect: Allows a character to attack twice in a single turn.
description: A gift from the Wind God that grants divine swiftness.

name: Chandika’s Divine Rage
effect: Gives all friendly characters +5 attack for three turns.
description: The warrior aspect of the Goddess unleashes unbridled fury.

name: Rahu’s Eclipse
effect: Prevents the opponent from drawing a card in their next turn.
description: The celestial shadow swallows fate itself, disrupting destiny.

name: Kali’s Dominion
effect: All enemy characters lose 3 attack for two turns.
description: The fierce goddess strikes terror into the hearts of foes.

name: Varuna’s Tidal Wave
effect: Forces the opponent to shuffle their hand into their deck and redraw.
description: The ocean god’s power resets the tides of battle.

name: Shakti Invocation
effect: Fully restores the energy of all friendly characters.
description: The invocation of divine feminine energy replenishes the soul.
